name: Defend the earth 2
description:
Basic Information

--------------------------------------------------

The second version of my Defend the Earth 2.

- Added 2 more enemies

- 2 more powerrups

- Movement is much more smoother.

-Made with Gamemaker studio 2.

-Just another fun bullet hell platformer.

-no bugs so far as I know of when testing :). 

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

---------------------------------------

W- Jump

WW- Double Jump

WWW- Triple Jump

A- Move left

D - Move Right

Left Mouse Button - shoot

--------------------------------------------

Powerrups

-------------------------------------------

Health - Adds 1hp, 30% spawn rate

Triple Fire- Fires 3 shots at the same time in different direction, 30% spawn rate

Penetration Bullet- Red lasar bullet allowed firing through walls, 30% spawn rate

Big Bullet- Does double damage and kills enemies waay faster than your regular bullet,10% spawn rate

Other

-------------------------------------

Don't be afraid to comment as I like to grow as a game developer, if knows bugs are found out on this game or my other games I would like to grow. Suggestion to improve the game is also welcome.
